summary: This mod aims to empower the destruction perk tree through the alteration of existing perks and the addition of new ones. You will be presented with a choice to specialize in fire, frost or shock magic receiving great power in your chosen area.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/45746-4-1382940578.jpg[/img]

[b]A Hypothetical Treachery[/b]



[b]Firstly this mod shortens the casting time of all Destruction spells:[/b]

- All the one-handed spells that previously had casting times of 0.5 seconds, now have casting times of 0.2 seconds. 

- The two-handed spells that previously had a casting time of 3 seconds, now has a casting time of 1 second. 

[b]This is a small, but greatly noticed increase in speed all spells. [/b]



[b]This mod also alters the \'Augmented\' perks to be significantly more effective. [/b]

-Level 1 of these perks now multiplies the damage of fire/frost/shock spells and weapon enchantments by 1.5x instead of 1.25x. 

-Level 2 of these perks now multiplies the damage of fire/frost/shock spells and weapon enchantments by 2x instead of 1.5x. 

[b]This greatly improves the effectiveness of your spells. [/b]



[b]Lastly this mod adds three new perks to the Destruction tree: Pyromage, Cryomage and Electromage.[/b]

[b]Pyromage[/b]: Doubles the effectiveness of your Fire-based spells and allows you acess to the \'Inferno\' spell.

[b]Cryomage[/b]: Doubles the effectiveness of your Frost-based spells and allows you acess to the \'Tundra\' spell.

[b]Electromage[/b]: Doubles the effectiveness of your Shock-based spells and allows you acess to the \'Electrocute\' spell.

- These perks are unique in the fact that you may only choose one of them. Once you have chosen one, the others are locked from you.

- The unique spells are added directly to your spell list upon taking the perk.

- The perks require you to have a destruction skill of 100 and \'Intense Flames\' or \'Deep Freeze\' or \'Disintegrate\' respectively.

-The new spells are master level concentration spells that deal 75 base fire/frost/shock damage per second. (It will be more like 300 by the time you get the perks however).

[b]These three unique perks will provide you with a method to specialize your destruction in a way not seen before.[/b]


Enjoy! :)


Also try: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=173879347]A Tragedy In Black - Enchanting Remastered[/url]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=184398713]Pyromage[/url]: a mod which adds a bunch of new and versatile spells for your Pyromancer character.
